welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Clifton Park, the charming town known for its picturesque parks, vibrant community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer during your stay here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schenectady County Airport handles all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Schenectady County Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing exclusive services and facilities for its passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Albany International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Albany International Airport is primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
